attributes.action: Give back the Parthenon Marbles to Greece
attributes.additional_details: To right a wrong and give the Marbles back to where they belong
attributes.background: To set a date in 2022 to deliver the marbles back to Greece

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the trustees of the British Museum.

You might like to sign this petition calling for changes to make it easier for items to be returned:

Amend the British Museum Act 1963: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600509
